attributes.title: ew

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: I had such a hard time with this app. I thought after downloading it it’ll make America great, but it didn’t :( America is still trash, like this app, like Donald Trump.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrific
attributes.review: When I download this app I got charged $20 because I pooped my pants in the midday class because they were going out of the office 😤

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is very disappointing. There is a o many malfunction in this app I can’t even explain... I would not recommend this app to anyone, I’m surprised I don’t get a virus on my phone.

attributes.title: My Review
attributes.review: I believe this is the very worst app on the app store. This app makes me not want to own an apple product. Donald Trump is an absolutely HORRIBLE person who had created an absolutely HORRIBLE app.

attributes.title: It literally ate my freezer
attributes.review: This app is cruel it decided to eat my freezer without my permission then burn my milk and orange juice all u have to say is Have😦you😱ever😭been😫snaked🤬by🤐a😏friend🤨then😞just🤩for🤒the🥶clout🤪they’ll🥳do😇it😊again🤯

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app but the developers found out I didn’t have a trump hat and came to my house to personally curb stomp me! In ground of my dog too! I was so embarrassed and disgraced! I will never support trump!!!
